replies.body: League needs to change how ranked points are given. I had an S- game in support, yet lose game to get demote. How about instead of only result of game that points are also determine by how well you played. So that maybe even if you lose but play well that you can still get points. I think its so dumb that 1 player in a game can total wreck a game for 4 other players. Time to rethink system to encourage better play.
the game then turns into a KDA farm instead of objectives.

No, because your mark is not solely based off of KDA. If you go for objectives, your mark would get better. Not saying that it should give you marks solely off of personal performance, but as mentioned, if you played well but your team was just trash, maybe reduce the amount of points lost or something.

It's not a matter of how well an individual does; it's about team performance. If we were earning LP based on our post-game ranks, League would be a 1v1 game. If you can't find a way to organise your team, perhaps you should be looking into ways to do so. I honestly don't see any problem with the current system.

Silly people talking like they know what they talk about {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} League of legends is a TEAM based game, if this was an INDIVIDUAL skill based game, what you suggested would work but it isn't. If they even implemented it, that means solo queue ranked will be all about polishing KDA. So stop whining and get good. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Its a team based game with a team I didn't choose so if it's a shitty team i shouldn't get punished for it. If the jungle insist he's going mid and deliberately feeds mid and we lose that's my fault how? riot doesn't even refund the lost lp if the reported person is punished.
Guys Just give up on him hes complaining because hes a bronze two player, u wanna know how you get outta bronze? 25 euro or get good kid {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
arrogance and condescension is why this game will always be toxic.
Even worse, it leads to endless afk farming of minions to get the perfect CS, and running when teamfights turn sour to avoid those deaths.
So if we're honor level 5, do we not get honor 3 and 4 level wards? (kinda want level four's over five's){{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
the wards are a work in progress, they could look nothing like the concept art provided.

The anticipation of who's getting a Victorious skin is always on everyone's minds. It's the anchor to succeed for most ranked players, and the reward we feel proud to show off years later...

However, with 130+ champions, it only seems logical they'd start making Victorious skins in packs of 5 per year. The quantity of skins you get could depend on your rank:

* Gold: 1
* Platinum: 2
* Diamond: 3
* Diamond 1: 4
* Master/Challenger: 5  



Being given a choice on which Victorious skin(s) you'd want, the remaining ones that you didn't pick could then be purchased with RP (so long as you're still Gold+).

And even with this method, you're looking at many, many years of Victorious skins, with 5x less seasonal complaining.

Obligatory Riot PLS.
Maybe if it's in packs of 3 or something cause pumping out that many victorious skins kind of ruins their uniqueness maybe different rewards would be better for higher ranks
130+ skins which mostly look the same is what you're asking for?

130+ skins... after 26 years from now. By which point so much will have been prone to drastically change that despite the sheer idiocy of what you said, it wouldn't even be relevant any more. There could be 100 more PROJECT skins, 100 more Blood Moon skins, and by that point probably another 200 champions, once again keeping the ratio of Victorious skins to Champions relatively uncommon. 

Round of applause to you.
Who takes Thunderlords on Braum? No wonder he's bronze.
he aint bronze tho :/
Hes Gold!
Hes probs boosted.
Will twisted treeline become a constant queue before the season ends? {{champion:117}}
I'm currently level 5 honor, but I prefer the level 3 ward skin... How can I get back to level 3 honor before the season end?
probably have to be toxic? lol

hold up. 
"Players issued a ban of seven days or more after 22/8/2017."
So that's after the 22nd? meaning that if you got a penalty on the 22nd you're safe to get rewards? 
It doesn't say from the 22nd :/

imo that's so bullshit. You can have a team of trolls who report you and you get banned for something you didn't do, and then lose rewards. Such a flawed system. I lose my ranked rewards purely because of this. Get bent riot.I earned my rewards.
They check the game logs before you get banned. If you were punished you deserved it mate. The real problem is there are too many people not being punished not the other way around.
yea i think ur safe. it clearly says AFTER the 22nd, not from. im surprised ppl even manage to get banned.
I wrote a ticket and they said that its from the 22nd. Don't know why they'd say "after" instead of "from".{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
So when does OCE open the 3v3 ranked queues >:(

Welcome to Thursday night madness, where half your teammates haven't even played the mode before, and many are unaware it's ranked queue, where Diamonds and Bronzes in the same game is common due to the separate queue mode, and it takes forever to get somewhere due to the great random variance in low level games due to the newbies (to that mode) coming in each week.

Still, it's usually decent fun.  Even if I have to patiently explain to the whining Plat that's smashing top lane that no, in fact I can't buy a sightstone...
Thursday night is when it opens
I was gold but have been demoted. Will I get the gold border or have to climb back to end the season at gold to get it?
You will need to work your way back up to Gold. It goes on what you end the season on.
If i got more than a 7 day ban after the 22-8-2017, will i get no rewards at all? including no border aswell?
I would like to know the answer as well please.

In regards to the 3 chromas for graves for getting gold+. Do we automatically get the twisted treeline chroma because we only have very limited time to play twisted treeline. Can someone from riot please clarify  howtwosted treeline and oce reward will work
What about rewarding the dedication to get -1,000 LP in Bronze V?
wait you can actually do that xD
Turns out -100 LP is the cap
If I'm Gold in Solo/Duo but Bronze in Flex will I still get the ward skin?
No, you need to be Silver+ in 2 queues.
Which border is going to be on display in norms game when your solo and flex are different ranked?
Hopefully the higher one XD
always the higher one
it depends, when u r playing normal and solo/duo ranked game, it will display your solo/duo border, when u r playing flex ranked game, it will display your flex border.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Do we get the border for normals (summoner's rift)?
the highest ranked border for each map is displayed, so if you're playing normals on SR, your highest of flex/solo border is shown, and ur 3v3 border is shown on TT
Hey, I'm challenger and just wanted to know what the physical reward is for this year.
$10 rp codes
